text: dEvA# vasavyAq dEvA$H SarmaNyAq dEvA$H sapItayaq ityA ba#ddhnAti dEqvatA#BirEqvAnvaqhaM ~MvRuShTi#micCatiq yadiq var.ShEqt-tAva#tyEqva hO#taqvya#M ~Myadiq na var.ShEqcCvO BUqtE haqvirnirva#pEdahOrAqtrE vai miqtrAvaru#NAvahOrAqtrAByAqM Kaluq vai paqrjanyO# var.Shatiq nakta#M ~MvAq hi divA# vAq var.Sha#ti miqtrAvaru#NAvEqva svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq tAvEqvAsmA# - [  ]  27
